section.section: When located on the right--amp--ndash;of--amp--ndash;way of any State highway, a mobile seafood or produce vendor may not sell, or offer for sale, any seafood or produce, unless the vendor has a lease from the State that allows the vendor to sell, or offer for sale, seafood or produce.
The State may require a mobile seafood or produce vendor to submit an application and pay a reasonable fee to be applied to administrative costs.
The State may not enter into a lease with a mobile produce vendor unless the applicable county licenses mobile produce vendors.

text.section: The State Highway Administration may adopt regulations to implement this section.
